quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
If you are not taking responsibility for your state of consciousness, you are not taking responsibility for life.
If you are living out of a sense of obligation you are a slave.
Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.
Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedomsâ€”to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
If an egg is broken by an outside force, life ends. If broken by an inside force, life begins. Great things always begin from the inside.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Desire, burning desire, is basic to achieving anything beyond the ordinary.
Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.
Too many people buy things they don't need with money they don't have to impress people they don't like.
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying.
Have I not destroyed my enemy when I have made him into my friend?
No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
You don't drown by falling in the water. You drown by staying there.
No man is truly great who is great only in his lifetime. The test of greatness is the page of history.
Many are stubborn in pursuit of the path they have chosen, few in pursuit of the goal.
It has been said that a person may have ten years of experience, or one year of experience repeated ten times.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
Learn from Yesterday, live for Today, hope for Tomorrow.
Life is never made unbearable by circumstances, but only by lack of meaning and purpose.
Be like the flower that gives fragrance even to the hand that crushes it.
Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
People do not decide to become extraordinary. They decide to accomplish extraordinary things.
When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
To achieve greatness one should live as if they will never die.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
